about_the_game:
About this game.
City Story is a horror-suspense-declassification game. The story begins through the production of a paranormal program, where a newbie cameraman and a down-on-his-luck producer visit a series of paranormal legends happening in Japan for the program.

About
This is my personal first work, may not be done perfectly, I hope you tolerate that
If you don't like the story, you can drop a bad review in the Steam comment section and submit a refund request to Steam customer service.

Game Features:

Game Setting:
The game is set around 2006 and features a series of stories that occur when a paranormal program production travels around the Japanese region collecting material to discover the truth behind all of this.

The game has some homage to some horror games and horror movie eggs that I hope you guys will find.

Gameplay Style:
A bleak and scary atmosphere is created with TV filters and some eerie music.

There will be some face-painted horror pictures or some gory scenes in the game, so please understand if it causes any bad effects.

Puzzle design:
Puzzle design are not too difficult, puzzle tips need to pay attention to some of the tips on the map, because there is no other game like the design of the backpack notepad function, you need to be in the 21st century network developed with the tools around you to record.
